snippet.title: Closed Beta Test Announcement Trailer |Dragonheir Official
snippet.description:
Adenthia, a land long silent, has heard your summons. At long last, the gates of Chaotic tribulation are opening, beckoning you in, welcoming you to step into your newest journey and play the overture of a brand-new adventure.
During your adventures throughout this 30-day beta test, you will experience a more spectacular world view, a sophisticated and enigmatic new sandbox, a gameplay that goes beyond hero and gear development, and brand-new interactive design experiences.

[Beta Test Duration]
2022/12/08 02:00 - 2023/01/07 01:59 (UTC+0)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Subscribe NOW to   @dragonheirsilentgods      to receive the latest game updates
Join Dragonheir: Silent Gods, the open-world high-fantasy strategy RPG, and start your adventure now with your heroic team!
